short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You are a tank commander Qh88, mission - destroy all enemy tanks! Full power ahead, go, point, shoot

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You are a tank commander, mission - destroy all enemy tanks! Full power ahead, go, point, shoot! Tank Arena - as the commander of your tank, navigate it in the war zone and shoot other tanks which try to destroy you
